name: get_commodity_price
description: This API provides historical data for major commodities such as crude oil, natural gas, copper, wheat, etc., spanning across various temporal horizons (daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, etc.)

interval.desciption: By default, interval=monthly. Strings daily, weekly, and monthly are accepted.

commodity.desciption: The commodity you want to check global price of which. Strings below are accepted: ['Crude Oil WIT','Crude Oil Brent','Natural Gas','Copper','Aluminum','Wheat','Corn','Cotton','Sugar','Coffee'].

apikey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_global_price_index_of_all_commodities
description: This API returns the global price index of all commodities in monthly, quarterly, and annual temporal dimensions.

interval.desciption: By default, interval=monthly. Strings monthly, quarterly, and annual are accepted.

apikey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.desciption: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
